pokepower.name: Shadow Command
pokepower.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may draw 2 cards. If you have 7 or more cards in your hand, discard a number of cards until you have 6 cards in your hand. Then, put 2 damage counters on Dusknoir. This power can't be used if Dusknoir is affected by a Special Condition.

attack.name: Damage Even
attack.text: Count the number of damage counters on Dusknoir. Put that many damage counters on 1 of your opponent's Pokemon.

attack.name: Night Spin
attack.text: Prevent all effects of an attack, including damage, done to Dusknoir by your opponent's Pokemon that has 2 or less Energy attached to it during your opponent's next turn.

pokepower.name: Emperor Aura
pokepower.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), when you play Empoleon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Active Pokemon, you may use this power. Your opponent can't attach any Energy cards from his or her hand to his or her Pokemon during your opponent's next turn.

attack.name: Steel Wing
attack.text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to Empoleon by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attack.name: Whirlpool
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokemon.

pokepower.name: Blaze Dance
pokepower.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), when you play Infernape from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokemon, you may flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for up to 4 {R} Energy cards and attach them to your Pokemon in any way you like. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attack.name: Close Combat
attack.text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to Infernape by attacks is increased by 30 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attack.name: Spreading Fire
attack.text: Discard 2 {R} Energy attached to Infernape and this attack does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

pokepower.name: Fin Luster
pokepower.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Lumineon is your Active Pokemon, you may look at your opponent's hand. If your opponent's Bench isn't full, choose 1 Basic Pokemon from your opponent's hand, and put it onto his or her Bench. Then, switch it with the Defending Pokemon. This power can't be used if Lumineon is affected by a Special Condition.

attack.name: Quick Swim
attack.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 20 damage to that Pokemon. This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance.

attack.name: Elegant Swim
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of an attack, including damage, done to Lumineon during your opponent's next turn.

pokepower.name: Magnetic Search
pokepower.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for a {L} or {M} Pokemon, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward. This power can't be used if Magnezone is affected by a Special Condition.

attack.name: Speed Shot
attack.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 30 damage to that Pokemon. This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness, Resistance, Poke-Powers, Poke-Bodies, or any other effects on that Pokemon.

attack.name: Crush Volt
attack.text: Discard an Energy attached to Magnezone.

pokepower.name: Super Connectivity
pokepower.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your discard pile for a {L} or {M} Energy card and attach it to your Active Pokemon. Then, put 1 damage counter on that Pokemon. This power can't be used if Magnezone is affected by a Special Condition.

attack.name: Gyro Ball
attack.text: You may switch Magnezone with 1 of your Benched Pokemon. If you do, your opponent switches the Defending Pokemon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokemon.

attack.name: Crash Chant
attack.text: Choose up to 4 in any combination of Pokemon Tool cards and Technical Machine cards in play (both yours and your opponent's) and discard them. This attack does 20 damage times the number of cards discarded in this way.

attack.name: Horror Chant
attack.text: If your opponent has 4 or more Benched Pokemon, choose 1 of them and return that Pokemon and all cards attached to it to your opponent's hand.

attack.name: Slice
attack.text: Raichu can't use Slice during your next turn.

attack.name: Split Ball
attack.text: Move an Energy card attached to Raichu to 1 of your Benched Pokemon.

attack.name: Burst Ball
attack.text: Discard 3 Energy attached to any of your Pokemon in any way you like.

pokebody.name: Regi Form
pokebody.text: If you have Regirock, Regice, and Registeel in play, the attack cost of Regigigas's attacks is {C} less.

attack.name: Giga Power
attack.text: You may do 60 damage plus 40 more damage. If you do, Regigigas does 40 damage to itself.

pokepower.name: Energy Trans
pokepower.text: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), move a {G} Energy card attached to 1 of your Pokemon to another of your Pokemon. This power can't be used if Sceptile is affected by a Special Condition.

attack.name: Poison Leaf
attack.text: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

attack.name: Slice Drain
attack.text: Remove 2 damage counters from Sceptile.

pokepower.name: Sunshine Song
pokepower.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), when you play Torterra from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokemon, you may choose as many of your {G} Pokemon in play as you like. For each {G} Pokemon you choose, search your deck for an Evolution card that evolves from that Pokemon and evolve it. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attack.name: Crash Impact
attack.text: Torterra does 20 damage to itself. Your opponent switches the Defending Pokemon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokemon, if any.

attack.name: Land Shake
attack.text: During your opponent's next turn, when your opponent puts a Basic Pokemon from his or her hand onto his or her Bench, put 2 damage counters on that Pokemon.

pokebody.name: Snow Veil
pokebody.text: As long as Abomasnow is your Active Pokemon, any damage done to your Pokemon by an opponent's attack is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attack.name: Snow Play
attack.text: Does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokemon, excluding {G} Pokemon and {W} Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

attack.name: Below Zero
attack.text: If Abomasnow evolved from Snover during this turn, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

pokepower.name: Cycler
pokepower.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may choose a card from your hand and put it on top of your deck. Then, search your deck for up to 2 basic Energy cards, show them to your opponent, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward. This power can't be used if Bronzong is affected by a Special Condition.

attack.name: Strange Spin
attack.text: If you have the same number of cards in your hand as your opponent, this attack does 20 damage plus 40 more damage and the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

attack.name: Heavy Potential
attack.text: Put a number of damage counters on each of your opponent's Pokemon equal to the number of {C} Energy in that Pokemon's Retreat Cost (after applying effects to the Retreat Cost).

pokebody.name: Sunny Day
pokebody.text: Each of your {G} Pokemon and {R} Pokemon's attacks does 10 more damage to the Defending Pokemon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attack.name: Salty-sweet Pollen
attack.text: Remove 2 damage counters from 1 of your Pokemon.

attack.name: Scorpion Grapple
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed. If tails, the Defending Pokemon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

attack.name: Cross Poison
attack.text: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads. If 2 or more of them are heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

attack.name: Derail
attack.text: Discard all Special Energy cards attached to the Defending Pokemon.

attack.name: Delivery
attack.text: Put any 1 card from your discard pile into your hand.

attack.name: Lifting
attack.text: Search your deck for up to 2 Basic Pokemon and put them onto your Bench. For each Basic Pokemon you put onto your Bench, you may search your deck for a basic Energy card and attach it to that Pokemon. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attack.name: Ominous Wind
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused and can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

pokebody.name: Spirit Pulse
pokebody.text: As long as Dusknoir is your Active Pokemon, put 1 damage counter on each of your opponent's Pokemon that has any Energy attached to it between turns.

attack.name: Darkness Mist
attack.text: If the Defending Pokemon already has 2 or more damage counters on it, this attack does 60 damage plus 20 more damage.

pokepower.name: Fainting Spell
pokepower.text: Once during your opponent's turn, if Gengar would be Knocked Out by damage from an attack, you may flip a coin. If heads, the Attacking Pokemon is Knocked Out.

attack.name: Shadow Room
attack.text: Put 3 damage counters on 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. If that Pokemon has any Poke-Powers, put 6 damage counters on that Pokemon instead.

attack.name: Poltergeist
attack.text: Look at your opponent's hand. This attack does 30 damage times the number of Trainer, Supporter, and Stadium cards in your opponent's hand.

attack.name: Tail Revenge
attack.text: Does 30 damage times the number of Magikarp in your discard pile.

attack.name: Wreak Havoc
attack.text: Flip a coin until you get tails. For each heads, discard the top card from your opponent's deck.

attack.name: Dragon Beat
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy card from each of your opponent's Pokemon.

attack.name: Take Out
attack.text: If the Defending Pokemon isn't an Evolved Pokemon, that Pokemon is Knocked Out instead of damaged by this attack.

attack.name: Hurricane Punch
attack.text: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

attack.name: Rage
attack.text: Does 60 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on Machamp.

attack.name: Ramming Strike
attack.text: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads or you may start again. Each time you start again, put 2 damage counters on Mamoswine. (If Mamoswine would be Knocked Out, you can't start again.)

attack.name: Parade
attack.text: Does 60 damage plus 10 more damage for each Swinub on your Bench, plus 20 more damage for each Piloswine on your Bench, and 40 more damage for each Mamoswine on your Bench.

pokebody.name: Burning Mane
pokebody.text: If Rapidash is your Active Pokemon and is damaged by an opponent's attack (even if Rapidash is Knocked Out), the Attacking Pokemon is now Burned.

attack.name: Shooting Fire
attack.text: Discard 2 {R} Energy attached to Rapidash and choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 60 damage to that Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

pokebody.name: Hidden Poison
pokebody.text: If Roserade is your Active Pokemon and is damaged by an opponent's attack (even if Roserade is Knocked Out), the Attacking Pokemon is now Poisoned.

attack.name: Bowed Whip
attack.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 30 damage to that Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.) Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy card attached to that Pokemon.

attack.name: Deep Poison
attack.text: If the Defending Pokemon is Poisoned, this attack does 50 damage plus 30 more damage.

pokebody.name: Battle Rush
pokebody.text: If your opponent has any Pokemon in play that has maximum HP of 120 or more, ignore all {C} Energy necessary to use Salamence's attacks.

attack.name: Steam Twister
attack.text: Discard a {R} Energy and a {W} Energy attached to Salamence.

pokebody.name: Honeycomb Defender
pokebody.text: If Scizor has 6 or more damage counters on it, any damage done to Scizor by attacks is reduced by 40 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attack.name: Accelerate
attack.text: If the Defending Pokemon is Knocked Out by this attack, prevent all effects of an attack, including damage, done to Scizor during your opponent's next turn.

attack.name: Pound Down
attack.text: If you don't have any Pokemon with any Poke-Powers in play, this attack does 40 damage plus 30 more damage.

pokepower.name: Evolutionary Gas
pokepower.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), when you play Skuntank from your hand to evolve 1 of your Active Pokemon, you may choose 1 of the Defending Pokemon. If that Pokemon tries to attack during your opponent's next turn, that attack does nothing.

attack.name: Poison Claws
attack.text: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

attack.name: Plunder
attack.text: Before doing damage, discard all Trainer cards attached to the Defending Pokemon.

pokebody.name: Protect Wing
pokebody.text: As long as Staraptor is your Active Pokemon, any damage done by attacks from your opponent's Stage 2 Evolved Pokemon is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attack.name: Strong Breeze
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, put 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon and all cards attached to it on top of your opponent's deck. Your opponent shuffles his or her deck afterward.

attack.name: Clutch
attack.text: The Defending Pokemon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

attack.name: Outbreak Power
attack.text: Choose a number of your opponent's Pokemon up to the amount of Energy attached to Steelix. This attack does 20 damage to each of them. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

attack.name: Iron Tail
attack.text: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 100 damage times the number of heads.

pokebody.name: Green Renewal
pokebody.text: Remove 1 damage counter from Tangrowth between turns.

attack.name: Green Acid
attack.text: Flip 2 coins. If the first coin is heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused. If the second coin is heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

attack.name: Reaching Vine
attack.text: Does 20 damage to 2 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

pokebody.name: Darkness Drive
pokebody.text: After your opponent's Pokemon uses a Poke-Power, you may search your discard pile for a basic {D} Energy card and attach it to Tyranitar.

attack.name: Grind
attack.text: Does 20 damage times the amount of Energy attached to Tyranitar.

attack.name: Spinning Tail
attack.text: This attack does 30 damage to each of your opponent's Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

pokebody.name: Green Dignity
pokebody.text: As long as you have more Prize cards left than your opponent, Vespiquen's attacks do 10 more damage for each {G} Pokemon on your Bench to the Active Pokemon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attack.name: Bee Drain
attack.text: After your attack, remove from Vespiquen the number of damage counters equal to the damage you did to the Defending Pokemon.

attack.name: Bee Powder
attack.text: Flip 2 coins. If both of them are heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Burned, Paralyzed, and Poisoned.

pokebody.name: Unaware
pokebody.text: Prevent all effects of attacks, excluding damage, done to Bibarel.

pokebody.name: Poison Enzyme
pokebody.text: Prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to Budew by your opponent's Poisoned Pokemon.

pokepower.name: Baby Evolution
pokepower.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may put Roselia from your hand onto Budew (this counts as evolving Budew) and remove all damage counters from Budew.

attack.name: Buddy-buddy
attack.text: Search your deck for a Pokemon, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attack.name: Dark One-eye
attack.text: You may discard a card from your hand. If you do, your opponent discards a card from his or her hand.

attack.name: Ambush
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage.

attack.name: Confuse Ray
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

attack.name: Trick Room
attack.text: If you have a Stadium card in play, this attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage. If your opponent has a Stadium card in play, remove 2 damage counters from Dusclops.

pokebody.name: Radiance
pokebody.text: If Electrode is your Active Pokemon and is damaged by an opponent's attack (even if Electrode is Knocked Out), put 1 damage counter on each of your opponent's Pokemon.

attack.name: Low Current
attack.text: If Electrode was damaged by an attack during your opponent's last turn, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

attack.name: Swift
attack.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness, Resistance, Poke-Powers, Poke-Bodies, or any other effects on the Defending Pokemon.

attack.name: Flash
attack.text: If the Defending Pokemon tries to attack during your opponent's next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack does nothing.

attack.name: Electro Diffusion
Go and Collect
attack.text: Search your deck for a Trainer, Supporter, or Stadium card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attack.name: Fury Cutter
attack.text: Flip 3 coins. If 1 of them is heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 10 more damage. If 2 of them are heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage. If all of them are heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 40 more damage.

attack.name: Tail Shake
attack.text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.

attack.name: Slam
attack.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 60 damage times the number of heads.

attack.name: Smog
attack.text: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

attack.name: Hoodwink
attack.text: You may search your opponent's discard pile for up to 3 in any combination of Trainer, Supporter, or Stadium cards and put them into your opponent's hand.

attack.name: Steady Punch
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage.

attack.name: Brick Break
attack.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Resistance, Poke-Powers, Poke-Bodies, or any other effects on the Defending Pokemon.

attack.name: Magnetic Resonance
attack.text: If you have a Stadium card in play, this attack does 20 damage to 2 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

attack.name: Magnetic Release
attack.text: Does 40 damage plus 10 more damage for each Energy attached to the Defending Pokemon.

attack.name: Thunder Wave
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

attack.name: Removal Pulse
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokemon.

attack.name: Collect
attack.text: Draw a card.

attack.name: Energy Milk
attack.text: Flip a coin until you get tails. For each heads, remove 2 damage counters from 1 of your Pokemon.

attack.name: Stomp
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage.

pokepower.name: Baby Evolution
pokepower.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may put Pikachu from your hand onto Pichu (this counts as evolving Pichu) and remove all damage counters from Pichu.

attack.name: Electric Circuit
attack.text: Search your discard pile for up to 4 {L} Energy cards, show them to your opponent, and put them into your hand.

attack.name: Rouse
attack.text: Does 20 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on Piloswine. Then, remove 4 damage counters from Piloswine.

attack.name: Overrun
attack.text: Does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

pokebody.name: Energy Protection
pokebody.text: Any damage done to Pupitar by attacks is reduced by 10 for each Energy attached to Pupitar (after applying Weakness and Resistance). You can't reduce more than 30 damage in this way.

attack.name: Rock Smash
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage.

pokebody.name: Overeager
pokebody.text: If Sableye is your Active Pokemon at the beginning of the game, you go first. (If each player's Active Pokemon has the Overeager Poke-Body, this power does nothing.)

attack.name: Impersonate
attack.text: Search your deck for a Supporter card and discard it. Shuffle your deck afterward. Then, use the effect of that card as the effect of this attack.

attack.name: Overconfident
attack.text: If the Defending Pokemon has fewer remaining HP than Sableye, this attack's base damage is 40.

attack.name: Swords Dance
attack.text: During your next turn, Scyther's Slashing Strike attack's base damage is 60.

attack.name: Slashing Strike
attack.text: During your next turn, Scyther can't use Slashing Strike.

attack.name: Body Slam
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

attack.name: Quick Attack
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage.

attack.name: Mach Blade
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 50 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

attack.name: Shot Air
attack.text: Does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

attack.name: Scary Face
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon can't attack or retreat during your opponent's next turn.

attack.name: Yawn
attack.text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.

attack.name: Self-abandonment
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 damage to the Defending Pokemon. If tails, Bidoof does 10 damage to itself.

attack.name: Gyro Swap
attack.text: Put a number of damage counters on the Defending Pokemon equal to the number of {C} Energy in Bronzor's Retreat Cost (after applying effects to the Retreat Cost).

attack.name: Psyshock
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

attack.name: Nap
attack.text: Remove 2 damage counters from Cherubi.

attack.name: Bullet Seed
attack.text: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

attack.name: Alert
attack.text: Draw a card. Then, you may switch Combee with 1 of your Benched Pokemon.

attack.name: Constrict
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

attack.name: Linear Attack
attack.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 10 damage to that Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

attack.name: Silhouette
attack.text: Put 1 damage counter on the Defending Pokemon. If the Defending Pokemon already has any damage counters on it, put 2 damage counters on that Pokemon instead.

attack.name: Surprise Attack
attack.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

attack.name: Aqua Liner
attack.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. This attack does 10 damage to that Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

attack.name: Mouth Pump
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 10 more damage.

attack.name: Pitch-Dark
attack.text: Your opponent can't play any Trainer cards from his or her hand during your opponent's next turn.

attack.name: Trick Gas
attack.text: You may switch Gastly with 1 of your Benched Pokemon.

attack.name: Rock Slide
attack.text: Does 10 damage to 2 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

attack.name: Knock Back
attack.text: Your opponent switches the Defending Pokemon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokemon.

attack.name: Sea Spray
attack.text: Flip a coin until you get tails. For each heads, draw a card.

attack.name: Magnetic Bomb
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 damage plus 10 more damage. If tails, Magnemite does 10 damage to itself.

attack.name: Random Spark
attack.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 20 damage to that Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

attack.name: Lullaby
attack.text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.

attack.name: Nightmare Feast
attack.text: If the Defending Pokemon is Asleep, this attack does 50 damage and remove 5 damage counters from Misdreavus. If the Defending Pokemon is not Asleep, this attack does nothing.

attack.name: Harden
attack.text: During your opponent's next turn, if Onix would be damaged by an attack, prevent that attack's damage done to Onix if that damage is 40 or less.

attack.name: Bind
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

attack.name: Speed Bolt
attack.text: If Pikachu evolved from Pichu during this turn, prevent all effects of an attack, including damage, done to Pikachu during your opponent's next turn.

attack.name: Agility
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of an attack, including damage, done to Ponyta during your opponent's next turn.

attack.name: Petal Spikes
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Asleep and Poisoned. If Budew is anywhere under Roselia, the Defending Pokemon is now Asleep and Poisoned.

attack.name: Stalk
attack.text: The Defending Pokemon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

attack.name: Dangerous Claw
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed. If tails, the Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

attack.name: Hide
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of an attack, including damage, done to Snover during your opponent's next turn.

attack.name: Powder Snow
attack.text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.

attack.name: Sand Attack
attack.text: If the Defending Pokemon tries to attack during your opponent's next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack does nothing.

attack.name: Double Stab
attack.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

attack.name: Gnaw and Run
attack.text: Switch Stunky with 1 of your Benched Pokemon.

attack.name: Double Scratch
attack.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

attack.name: Freezing Breath
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed. If tails, the Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.

attack.name: Take Down
attack.text: Flip a coin. If tails, Swinub does 10 damage to itself.

attack.name: Ingrain
attack.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing. If heads, search your deck for a {G} Energy card and attach it to Tangela. Shuffle your deck afterward. If you do, prevent all effects of an attack, including damage, done to Tangela during your opponent's next turn.

attack.name: Tickle
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

attack.name: Call for Friends
attack.text: Search your deck for a Basic Pokemon, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attack.name: Poison Breath
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

attack.name: Screech
attack.text: If an attack does damage to the Defending Pokemon (after applying Weakness and Resistance), that attack does 20 more damage to that Pokemon until the end of your next turn.

attack.name: Double Spin
attack.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

attack.name: Outlet
attack.text: Search your deck for a {L} Energy card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attack.name: Bouncing Ball
attack.text: Flip a coin. If tails, Voltorb does 10 damage to itself.

stadium.text: This card stays in play when you play it. Discard this card if another Stadium card comes into play. If another card with the same name is in play, you can't play this card. Once during each player's turn, the player may flip a coin. If heads, that player searches his or her discard pile for a {L} or {M} Energy card, shows it to the opponent, and puts it into his or her hand.

trainer.text: Attach Energy Link to 1 of your Pokemon that doesn't already have a Pokemon Tool attached to it. If that Pokemon is Knocked Out, discard this card. As long as Energy Link is attached to a Pokemon, you may move an Energy card attached to that Pokemon to another of your Pokemon that has Energy Link attached to it. You may use this effect as often as you like during your turn.
Move a basic Energy card attached to 1 of your Pokemon to another of your Pokemon.
Search your deck for a Basic Pokemon and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.

Search your deck for a Pokemon (excluding Pokemon LV.x), show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward. If any Luxury Ball is in your discard pile, you can't play this card.

supporter.text: You can play only one Supporter card each turn. When you play this card, put it next to your Active Pokemon. When your turn ends, discard this card. Search your discard pile for 2 different Trainer, Supporter, or Stadium cards, show them to your opponent, and your opponent chooses 1 of them. Put that card into your hand, and discard the other card. (If all Trainer, Supporter, and Stadium cards in your discard pile have the same name, choose 1 of them. Show that card to your opponent, and put it into your hand.)

trainer.text: You may play 2 Poke Blower + at the same time. If you play 1 Poke Blower +, flip a coin. If heads, put 1 damage counter on 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. If you play 2 Poke Blower +, choose 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon and switch it with 1 of your opponent's Active Pokemon.

You may play 2 Poke Drawer + at the same time. If you play 1 Poke Drawer +, draw a card. If you play 2 Poke Drawer +, search your deck for up to 2 cards, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

You may play 2 Poke Healer + at the same time. If you play 1 Poke Healer +, remove 1 damage counter and a Special Condition from 1 of your Active Pokemon. If you play 2 Poke Healer +, remove 8 damage counters and all Special Conditions from 1 of your Active Pokemon.
Search your deck or your discard pile for a Pokemon LV.x, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. If you search your deck, shuffle your deck afterward.
Remove 2 damage counters from 1 of your Pokemon (remove 1 damage counter if that Pokemon has only 1).
Switch 1 of your Active Pokemon with 1 of your Benched Pokemon.

energy.text: Cyclone Energy provides {C} Energy. When you attach this card from your hand to your Active Pokemon, switch 1 of the Defending Pokemon with 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. Your opponent chooses the Benched Pokemon to switch.
Warp Energy provides {C} Energy. When you attach this card from your hand to your Active Pokemon, switch that Pokemon with 1 of your Benched Pokemon.

pokepower.name: Heat Wave
pokepower.text: Once at the end of your turn, if Heatran is on your Bench, you may use this power. If you discarded basic Energy cards attached to your {R} or {M} Active Pokemon by using that Pokemon's attack this turn, attach up to 2 of those Energy cards to that Pokemon.

attack.name: Strong-Willed
attack.text: During your opponent's next turn, if Machamp would be Knocked Out by damage from an attack,flip a coin. If heads, Machamp is not Knocked Out and its remaining HP becomes 10 instead.

attack.name: Voltage Shoot
attack.text: Discard 2 {L} Energy cards from your hand and choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 80 to that Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

attack.name: Giga Blaster
attack.text: Discard the top card from your opponent's deck. Then, choose 1 card from your opponent's hand without looking and discard it. Regigigas can't use Giga Blaster during your next turn.

attack.name: Ember
attack.text: Discard a {R} Energy attached to Charmander.

attack.name: Flamethrower
attack.text: Discard a {R} Energy attached to Charmeleon.

pokebody.name: Energy Burn
pokebody.text: All Energy attached to Charizard are {R} Energy instead of their usual type.

attack.name: Fire Spin
attack.text: Discard 2 Energy attached to Charizard.

pokebody.name: Unburden
pokebody.text: If Drifloon has a Pokemon Tool card attached to it, Drifloon's Retreat Cost is {C}{C} more.

attack.name: Big Explosion
attack.text: Drifloon does 50 damage to itself.

attack.name: Counting Song
attack.text: Put up to 3 damage counters on Duskull. Then, put that many damage counters on the Defending Pokemon.

attack.name: Night Bind
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent can't attach any Energy cards from his or her hand to the Active Pokemon during his or her next turn.

attack.name: Fastball
attack.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage to that Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

attack.name: Charge Beam
attack.text: Search your discard pile for a {L} Energy card and attach it to Voltorb.

attack.name: Thundershock
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
